<?xml version1.0?> <!DOCTYPE project SYSTEM "WebTest.dtd">
<project nameFullSuite defaulttestSuite basedir.>
<property namesuite.xml valueTestSuite.xml />
<target nametestSuite dependstestSuiteFrench,testSuiteEnglish />
<target nametestSuiteFrench> <ant antfile${suite.xml}> <property fileproperties/french.properties/> </ant> </target> <target nametestSuiteEnglish> <ant antfile${suite.xml}> <property fileproperties/english.properties/> </ant> </target>
</project>
